long_description: The Therm-a-Rest Trail Scout Sleeping Pad is an ideal value for first-time campers and those looking to upgrade from closed-cell foam pads. It works well for light backpacking and car camping. Streamlined shape keeps the weight and size down while a generous 1 in. Thermal Foam core and supple exterior mold to your contours for a great night's rest. Weighs just 1 lb. 6 oz. for the regular-size pad. Self-inflating pad has an R-Value of 3.4; most sleeping pads we sell range in R-value from 1.0 (minimally insulated) to 9.5 (well insulated). Therma-a-Rest Trail Scout Sleeping Pad includes a stuff sack.
